name: Wmiprvse Spawning Process
query: ((process.parent.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Mm][Ii][Pp][Rr][Vv][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.LogonId:(/0[Xx]3[Ee]7/ OR null) OR winlog.event_data.User:(/.*[Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr][Ii].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii].*/) OR process.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Mm][Ii][Pp][Rr][Vv][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ee][Rr][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:winlog.event_data.LogonId)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:*\\WmiPrvSe.exe AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.LogonId:(0x3e7 OR null) OR winlog.event_data.User:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*) OR process.executable:(*\\WmiPrvSE.exe OR *\\WerFault.exe)))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:winlog.event_data.LogonId)))`
